alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 11 at 5:13PM MST until December 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Interstate 80 near Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will cause significant reduction in visibility and whiteout conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
